frameDefinitions: Words in this frame name medical conditions or diseases that a patient suffers from, is being treated for, may be cured of, or die of.
An Agent attempts to achieve a Goal.
An Entity meets the pre-conditions for participating in an Event.
This frame contains items which, when manipulated, alter the function of some device, internal or external.
An Agent makes use of a Means (either an action or a (system of) entities standing in for the action) in order to achieve a Purpose.
Unless a particular Required_situation obtains, Negative_consequences will follow.
frameExamples: Conductor software gives us the hands-on <t>capability</t> to provide updates immediately
This <t>button</t> makes the radio turn on.
The primary <t>means</t> of gas detection is mass spectroscopy .
You <t>must</t> turn in your test by 5 p.m.
listRoleDefinitions: This role is used for the patient, entity, or population (originally) affected by the condition or illness.
The location where the <fen>Ailment</fen> is effecting the <fen>Patient</fen>s.
The <fen>Agent</fen> makes an attempt to achieve a <fen>Goal</fen>.
The <fen>Goal</fen> is what the <fen>Agent</fen> attempts to achieve.
This role identifies the <fen>Time</fen> when the attempt occurs.
The place where an attempt is made.
The <fen>Entity</fen> whose meeting or falling short of pre-conditions is assessed.
The <fen>Event</fen> that the <fen>Entity</fen> may participate in.
The time at which the <fen>Entity</fen> is capable of the <fen>Event</fen>.
This role identifies the entity or substance that is designed to have a particular <fen>Use</fen>. This is often an incorporated FE.
The Agent uses the Means to acheive a Purpose.
The action performed by the Agent.
The goal or purpose of the Agent.
The period during which the <fen>Required_situation</fen> is necessary to prevent negative consequences.
The location within which the <fen>Required_situation</fen> is required.
listRoleExamples: <fex>On the bridge</fex> he attempted to put the wig on.
White House voices doubts about Aristide's ability <fex>to govern</fex>
He was told that <fex>when he got back</fex> , his column needed a serious rethink .
<fex>In California</fex> , seatbelts must be fastened at all times .
